hero.title: Start your Thai Company correctly
hero.subtitle: Trusted by 500+ founders
hero.description: We handle the Department of Business Development, Tax Registration, and Social Security so you can focus on your business.

features.title: Everything you need to trade legally

items.title: Company Name Reservation
items.description: We check and reserve your name with the DBD instantly.

items.title: MoA & Articles of Association
items.description: Drafting all statutory meeting notes and bylaws.

items.title: VAT & Tax Registration
items.description: Getting your Tax ID and VAT certificate (P.P.20).

items.title: Bank Account Opening
items.description: Assistance with board resolutions to open your corporate bank account.

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We clarify your business objectives and shareholders.

steps.title: Name Reservation
steps.description: Locking in your company name (1-3 days).

steps.title: Filing & Signing
steps.description: Directors sign the application. We submit to DBD.

steps.title: Company Formed
steps.description: Receive your Affidavit and Company Certificate.

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer: Typically 3-5 business days after name reservation.

items.question: Do I need a Thai shareholder?
items.answer: Yes, unless you have BOI promotion or FBL.

hero.title: Stress-free Accounting & Tax Filing
hero.subtitle: Starting from 2,500 THB/month
hero.description: Expert accountants handling your Withholding Tax, VAT, and Social Security. We ensure you never miss a deadline.

items.title: Transaction Recording
items.description: Daily recording of invoice, receipt, and expense.

items.title: Tax Filing (P.P.30, P.N.D.3/53)
items.description: Monthly submission to Revenue Department.

items.title: Social Security
items.description: Monthly SSO submission for employees.

items.title: Monthly Reports
items.description: Profit & Loss and Balance Sheet in English/Thai.

steps.title: Send Documents
steps.description: Send us photos/scans via LINE or Email.

steps.title: We Process
steps.description: Our team records and verifies everything.

steps.title: Review & Confirm
steps.description: You confirm tax amounts before filing.

steps.title: Filing & Report
steps.description: We file taxes and send you the monthly report.

items.question: Can you handle English documents?
items.answer: Yes, our team is fluent in English and Thai.

items.question: Is software included?
items.answer: Yes, we use cloud accounting software accessible 24/7.

hero.title: Bookkeeping that scales with your ambition
hero.subtitle: Dedicated accounting squad
hero.description: We combine daily transaction posting with insightful monthly reporting so you always know where your business stands.
highlights: Daily reconciliations across bank, e-commerce, and POS channels
IFRS-compliant financial statements with management insights
Quarterly tax planning with proactive recommendations

items.title: Transaction processing
items.description: Invoices, receipts, and expenses posted daily with supporting documents.

items.title: Bank reconciliation
items.description: Automated feeds plus manual checks to ensure every baht is accounted for.

items.title: Management reporting
items.description: Tailored dashboards and commentary for leadership meetings.

items.title: Tax compliance
items.description: Monthly VAT, WHT, and annual returns filed with confidence.

overview.introDescription: From daily postings to monthly board packs, Virintira handles the detail so your leadership can focus on growth and compliance decisions.
overview.coverageTitle: Where we plug into your finance stack

coverageItems.title: General ledger control
coverageItems.description: Chart of accounts governance, journal entries, and supporting documentation organised in the cloud.

coverageItems.title: Accounts payable and receivable
coverageItems.description: Invoice scheduling, vendor communication, and customer collections with clear audit trails.

coverageItems.title: Expense and payroll sync
coverageItems.description: Reimbursements, payroll summaries, and statutory deductions reconciled against bank activity.

coverageItems.title: Management commentary
coverageItems.description: Variance analysis, KPI tracking, and insights tailored for founders and finance leaders.

overview.note: Every engagement includes bilingual support and quarterly strategy reviews.

items.label: On-time filing rate across VAT and WHT
Industries served across Thailand and APAC

process.heading: How we keep your books current
process.description: A proven onboarding and monthly rhythm that delivers accurate numbers and actionable commentary.

steps.title: Diagnostic and clean-up
steps.description: We review historical data, align your chart of accounts, and resolve outstanding reconciliations.

steps.title: Systems integration
steps.description: Connect accounting platforms, banks, POS, and payroll tools to our secure automation stack.

steps.title: Daily bookkeeping cadence
steps.description: Transactions are posted, reconciled, and matched with documents every business day.

steps.title: Monthly close & insights
steps.description: Deliver IFRS-compliant statements, KPI dashboards, and executive commentary for decision making.

items.title: Dedicated account manager
items.description: One point of contact who understands your operations, reports, and preferred communication style.

items.title: Compliance vigilance
items.description: Proactive monitoring of statutory deadlines, regulatory updates, and filing requirements.

items.title: Integrated tooling
items.description: Access to dashboards, secure document sharing, and real-time status updates across every engagement.

ctaBanner.heading: Let Virintira run your books end-to-end
ctaBanner.description: Schedule a consultation and receive a tailored bookkeeping playbook with implementation steps in under 48 hours.

items.question: How quickly can you onboard our company?
items.answer: Most clients are fully onboarded within 10 business days once we receive access to historical records and accounting systems.

items.question: Do you support multiple currencies?
items.answer: Yes. We manage multi-currency ledgers, FX revaluations, and consolidation for regional entities.

article.title: Why disciplined bookkeeping matters for Thai SMEs
article.author: Virintira Insights
article.intro: Strong bookkeeping is more than complianceтАФit is the engine that powers confident decisions, investor trust, and sustainable growth.

sections.heading: Turn chaos into clarity
content: Without structured bookkeeping, leaders spend their time hunting receipts and reconciling mismatched spreadsheets. By outsourcing to a dedicated accounting team, you gain reliable numbers every morning.
Clean data enables faster approvals, smarter procurement, and transparent vendor management.

sections.heading: Stay ahead of compliance
content: Thai tax regulations evolve regularly. A disciplined monthly close ensures VAT, withholding tax, and corporate filings are submitted accurately and on time.
Virintira keeps you audit ready with documented workflows and digital archives.

sections.heading: Fuel strategic decisions
content: Investors and lenders require trustworthy statements. When your bookkeeping is current, you can raise funds, expand locations, and hire confidently.
Use cash-flow forecasts and profitability analysis to plan next quarter with certainty.

article.conclusion: When your books are in order, you free up headspace to focus on customers and innovation. Virintira keeps finance smooth so you can keep momentum.

items.title: Centralise documents
items.description: Adopt a shared drive for receipts so nothing is missed.

items.title: Schedule weekly reconciliations
items.description: Align bank feeds with sales platforms to catch issues early.

items.title: Review KPIs monthly
items.description: Track margins, expenses, and cash position to guide decisions.

hero.title: Prepare monthly financial statements with confidence
hero.description: Follow this workflow to close your books quickly and deliver insights to leadership.

steps.title: Collect source documents
steps.description: Gather invoices, receipts, bank statements, and payroll reports for the period.

steps.title: Post and reconcile
steps.description: Record transactions in your ledger and reconcile bank, cash, and digital wallets.

steps.title: Review adjustments
steps.description: Accrue expenses, recognise revenue, and verify inventory counts.

steps.title: Generate statements
steps.description: Produce P&L, balance sheet, and cash-flow statements, then share with stakeholders.

monthlyStatements.cta: Need help? Email {email} and our accountants will step in.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide foreign and local entrepreneurs with seamless, compliant, and highly efficient back-office support, enabling them to focus entirely on scaling their businesses.

story.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: Founded on the principle of absolute transparency, Virintira started with a simple goal: making Thai corporate compliance easy to understand.
Today, we serve hundreds of companiesтАФfrom emerging startups to established multinational corporationsтАФdelivering tailored financial strategies and rock-solid accounting.

transparency.title: Transparency First
transparency.description: No hidden fees, no opaque processes. We believe in clear communication at every stage.

speed.title: Uncompromising Speed
speed.description: Time is money. Our digital-first approach ensures rapid turnarounds for all filings and reports.

reliability.title: Rock-Solid Reliability
reliability.description: Fully certified by the DBD, we've never left a project unfinished. Your business is safe with us.
